patthana12.15:1.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.15:2.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.15:3.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.15:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.15:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana12.15:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.15:7.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana12.15:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.15:9.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
